mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Benham, Henry Washington
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. Pierpont, Wheeling Jun 2 1861. By telegraph from New York 1861. As soon as Genl Rosecrans specifications were examined I was released and am to go on duty. If you still desire that department & myself as commander an early effort may secure this. H. W. Benham Brig Genl 33w76&175 call
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Benham, Henry Washington
New York City, New York
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
